name: Fiber Network Identification
title: FNI
definition: Identifies all services associated with a particular fiber based network. Also may identify customer ring and associated ring  services.
validEntryNotes: A valid entry of “N” is used when an FNI has not previously been assigned.
usageNotes: Required when the first position of the REQTYP   field is “R” and the UNE field is not populated.
Required for DS1/DS3 within a fiber network when   the ACT field is “N” “C” “M” “T” or “R” and the   UNE field is not populated.
Required for services riding a dedicated ring when   the ACT field is “N” “C” “M” “T” or “R” and the   UNE field is not populated.
fieldNotes: The Fiber Network Identification data will be   assigned by the provider.
